name: @smartcontractkit/ccip-read
description: A protocol for contract-initiated offchain data retrieval

scripts.preinstall: for d in packages/server packages/examples; do cd $d; yarn install || exit; cd -; done
scripts.test: for d in packages/server packages/examples; do cd $d; yarn test || exit; cd -; done
scripts.lint: for d in packages/server packages/examples; do cd $d; yarn lint || exit; cd -; done
scripts.build: for d in packages/server packages/examples; do cd $d; yarn build || exit; cd -; done
scripts.docs: for d in packages/server packages/examples; do cd $d; yarn docs || exit; cd -; done
scripts.clean: for d in packages/server packages/examples; do cd $d; yarn clean || exit; cd -; done

author: @smartcontractkit
